text: Blingel is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated some 5 miles(8 km) northeast of Hesdin at the D94 and D107 crossroads. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Blingel
